synopsis.text: Misa Hayase, a dedicated bridge officer, Hikaru Ichijou, a spirited acrobatic pilot, and Minmay Lynn, a budding idol, find themselves entangled in a cosmic conflict that redefines humanity's existence. A decade after an alien spacecraft crash-lands on Earth, uniting the world under the United Nations, the repurposed vessel, christened the SDF-1 Macross, embarks on its inaugural journey. However, an extraterrestrial race, the Zentradi, descend upon Earth, triggering an interstellar war as the Macross inexplicably opens fire. In a desperate bid to evade the enemy, the Macross inadvertently teleports itself and the surrounding city to the distant corners of the universe. Witness the epic odyssey of the Macross crew as they navigate the harsh realities of war, striving to return to their home planet.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
